sentence: Mandela Barnes and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, as well as Alex Lasry, the son of a billionaire hedge-fund manager who is also co-owner of the Milwaukee Bucks basketball team, and Tom Nelson, the top elected official in a county southwest of Green Bay.
author: John McCormick
title: Ron Johnson, Republican Senator, to Seek Third Term in Wisconsin

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) leading that primary field with 23 percent support, with Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trailing at 13 percent support, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson garnering five percent support and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski three percent.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill

sentence: ); Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry; state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and a county executive, Tom Nelson.
title: The most interesting Democratic primaries of 2022
